body.raw:
In this article, we analyze Dosu bot usage in Lobechat pull requests. As I was studying the lobechat code, for some reason I ended up on this [pull request](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/issues/4395) and found that there is a comment from [dosubot](https://github.com/apps/dosubot).

![image](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:875/1*Q_bkJ_gaCKxcMM3ImK448g.png)

# **Dosu**

Dosu lets engineers focus on value-add work by answering questions, triaging issues, and maintaining documentation for them.

Read [Dosu documentation](https://docs.dosu.dev/pages/onboarding-quickstart) to learn how you can use Dosu in your projects.

## **Dosu community reactions:**

1\. [“The bot is right!”](https://github.com/run-llama/llama_index/issues/7684#issuecomment-1721430612)  
2\. [“Yes, that was the problem, I can confirm it works fine now!”](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain/issues/13115#issuecomment-1803510213)  
3\. [“Thanks jinja2 worked perfectly.”](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain/issues/13055#issuecomment-1801778473)  
4\. [“Thank you, you have been very helpful.”](https://github.com/astronomer/astronomer-cosmos/issues/670#issuecomment-1809333870)

## **Limited Access Beta**

At the time of writing this article, Dosu is in Beta. If you’re interesting in trying out Dosu, join their waiting list at [https://dosu.dev](https://dosu.dev/) or reach out to dosu team at hi@dosu.dev

Dosu can be installed on any repository, but it will not do anything until you’re taken off the waitlist.

# **Dosu’s comment on Lobechat repo:**

1. [Failed to locate the entry point in lobechat code](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/issues/4395)
    
2. [Too many requests, please wait before trying again.](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/issues/3994)
    

![image](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:875/1*Q_bkJ_gaCKxcMM3ImK448g.png)

# **About me:**

Hey, my name is Ramu Narasinga. I study large open-source projects and create content about their codebase architecture and best practices, sharing it through articles, videos.

I am open to work on interesting projects. Send me an email at ramu.narasinga@gmail.com

My Github — [https://github.com/ramu-narasinga](https://github.com/ramu-narasinga)

My website — [https://ramunarasinga.com](https://ramunarasinga.com/)

My Youtube channel — [https://www.youtube.com/@thinkthroo](https://www.youtube.com/@thinkthroo)

Learning platform — [https://thinkthroo.com](https://thinkthroo.com/)

Codebase Architecture — [https://app.thinkthroo.com/architecture](https://app.thinkthroo.com/architecture)

Best practices — [https://app.thinkthroo.com/best-practices](https://app.thinkthroo.com/best-practices)

Production-grade projects — [https://app.thinkthroo.com/production-grade-projects](https://app.thinkthroo.com/production-grade-projects)

# **References:**

1. [https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/issues/4395](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/issues/4395)
    
2. [https://github.com/apps/dosubot](https://github.com/apps/dosubot)
    
3. [https://github.com/devstein](https://github.com/devstein)
    
4. [https://dosu.dev/](https://dosu.dev/)
    
5. [https://docs.dosu.dev/pages/onboarding-quickstart](https://docs.dosu.dev/pages/onboarding-quickstart)
